scripts.serve: bun run build:watch & firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:lineup: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions:lineup
scripts.deploy:authBlock: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions:authBlock
scripts.deploy:email: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions:email
scripts.deploy:tx: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions:transactions
scripts.deploy:dry: bun run pp && firebase deploy --only functions --dry-run && echo 'Server dry run complete!'
scripts.pp: bun run all-checks && bun run build
scripts.all-checks: bun run fix && bun run types && bun run test:ci && echo 'All Server checks passed!'
